name: simple
caption: Simple

effect.short: Doubles the Pokémon's [stat modifiers]{mechanic:stat-modifiers}.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.
effect.full:
Each stage of this Pokémon's [stat modifiers]{mechanic:stat-modifiers} acts as two stages.  These doubled stages are still limited to a minimum of -6 and a maximum of 6.

This Pokémon can still accumulate less than -3 or more than 3 stages of stat modifiers, even though the extra ones have no effect after doubling.

flavorText: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
